thread.title: 15 Things That Lasted Longer Than Michael Flynn As National Security Adviser
thread.title_full: 15 Things That Lasted Longer Than Michael Flynn As National Security Adviser

author: Lee Moran
title: 15 Things That Lasted Longer Than Michael Flynn As National Security Adviser
text: 15 Things That Lasted Longer Than Michael Flynn As National Security Adviser "I have had ice creams that lasted longer than Michael Flynn." 02/14/2017 07:13 am ET Lee Moran Trends Editor, The Huffington Post What does Kim Kardashian‚Äôs marriage to Kris Humphries have in common with a dragonfly‚Äôs lifespan? They‚Äôre both longer-lasting than Michael Flynn‚Äôs tenure as President Donald Trump‚Äôs national security adviser. Flynn resigned Monday night, just 24 days into the role, amid allegations he discussed U.S. sanctions against Russia with the Russian ambassador in the weeks before Trump took office. If proven true, Flynn could be in violation of the Logan Act , which prohibits private citizens from negotiating with foreign governments. Twitter users promptly responded to Flynn‚Äôs brief term with suggestions of things they say have had more staying power. Below is a list of 15 of the best tweets. Kim Kardashian's Marriage To Kris Humphries To put things in perspective, THIS lasted longer than Michael Flynn's tenure in Trump's White House. pic.twitter.com/IyQSjv4Bih ‚Äî Diane N. Sevenay (@Diane_7A) February 14, 2017 At 72 days, their wedded bliss was three times as long as Flynn's time in the job. A David Blaine Stunt I'm pretty sure at last one David Blaine stunt lasted longer than Mike Flynn's tenure as Nat'l Security Advisor. ‚Äî Blackneck Barca üá≠üáπ (@blaknek) February 14, 2017 Blaine‚Äôs ‚Äú Above the Below ‚Äù stunt in London in 2003 lasted for 44 days. An Orgasm ‚Äî Andy Eats Worms (@andyeatsworms) February 14, 2017 Hmm. Dishwashing Liquid My dishwashing liquid lasts for at least 2 months, longer than Mike Flynn. And it's only 500ml! #MICHAELFLYNN #flynn ‚Äî Afiq Harraz (@AfiqH1507) February 14, 2017 Biscuits I literally have boxes of biscuits in my #Cabinet with longer shelf lives than at least one #Cabinet member. #MichaelFlynn #FlynnResigns ‚Äî Jeff Fleischer (@jefffleischer) February 14, 2017 Employment Of Stoned Pizza Deliverers Stoned teenagers delivering pizzas to the wrong addresses have held onto their jobs longer than Michael Flynn did. ‚Äî Jim Vejvoda (@JimVejvoda) February 14, 2017 Eggs I have eggs in my refrigerator that have lasted longer than Michael Flynn...and they never lied to the American people even once. ‚Äî Sanho Tree (@SanhoTree) February 14, 2017 Houseflies ‚Äî Bryan with a Y (@jaxjaggywires) February 14, 2017 Ice Cream ‚Äî John Stevenson (@Stevorocket1) February 14, 2017 Some Food In The Fridge I have food in my fridge that lasted longer than Michael Flynn.
